title: Glitches at Slack, Peloton Prompt Disruptions for Users
sub_head: Messaging platform and fitness-equipment maker said issues were resolved several hours after glitches were initially disclosed
body:
Messaging platform Slack and fitness-equipment company Peloton Interactive Inc . suffered glitches on Tuesday, limiting workplace communication and hampering online workouts.
Slack said Tuesday afternoon that it had fixed a technical issue. The resolution came about five hours after the company earlier said the platform wasnâ€™t loading properly for some users.
